FuncDef:
The lsp-remaining-lifetime refresh disable command disables automatic IS-IS LSP Remaining Lifetime adjustment.
The undo lsp-remaining-lifetime refresh disable command enables automatic IS-IS LSP Remaining Lifetime adjustment. The lsp-remaining-lifetime refresh disable command disables automatic IS-IS LSP Remaining Lifetime adjustment. The undo lsp-remaining-lifetime refresh disable command enables automatic IS-IS LSP Remaining Lifetime adjustment. By default, automatic IS-IS LSP Remaining Lifetime adjustment is enabled.
